name: basicxss
description: This is a simple and basic filtering package just to prevent a user input from xss .

scripts.build: parcel build --no-autoinstall src/index.ts --target node --out-dir dist --out-file index.js
scripts.watch: parcel watch --no-autoinstall src/index.ts --target node --out-dir dist --out-file index.js
